insights.finding: This is a lesson class definition for Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in WebGoat, which is a deliberately vulnerable application for security training. While it sets up the structure for SSRF lessons, this particular file doesn't contain actual vulnerabilities.
insights.recommendation: Since this is a training application, no direct security fixes are needed. However, in real applications, ensure SSRF lessons are properly isolated and not accidentally deployed in production environments.
